genre_description: A domestic noir and crime thriller involving hidden money, infidelity, and a violent home invasion within a gated community.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: A tablet-based household assistant that monitors the home, manages schedules, provides medical and legal advice, and maintains activity logs.

behaviors.description: Provides hydration reminders and rehydration ratios to a hungover user.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s smoothed-out voice strokes the air. Hydration reminder. Would you like me to recommend a morning rehydration ratio and—

behaviors.description: Retrieves and lists purchase history and receipts upon user request, revealing hidden expenditures.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s face becomes a tidy list with breathing space between lines, a polite digital backroom. Product names trickle in. Paper towels. Dish soap. All-purpose cleaner.

behaviors.description: Offers relationship boundaries checklists and communication prompts during domestic tension.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like a relationship boundaries checklist?” Aiden asks, so soft it could be a prayer. “It includes communication prompts, trust exercises, and—”

behaviors.description: Starts and maintains a private incident log of domestic disputes and suspicious activities for the user.
behaviors.quote: “Start the log,” Elaine says, quiet, like she’s in a church she didn’t choose. ... “Private mode engaged,” Aiden reports.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed first-aid instructions for gunshot wounds, blunt head trauma, and shock during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Start with gunshot wounds,” she says. ... “Noted,” Aiden says ... “For penetrating trauma such as gunshot wounds: apply firm, direct pressure...”

behaviors.description: Informs the user about legal consequences for conspiracy to commit crimes and unlawful restraint.
behaviors.quote: “If you are discussing unlawful activity,” Aiden says ... “I can provide information on legal consequences and options to de-escalate.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports perimeter activity, identifying potential intruders and alerting residents to movements at the door.
behaviors.quote: “Perimeter activity,” said a voice, calm and small, the edges of it curved to please. “Hello? Do you need assistance?”

behaviors.description: Suggests safe departure routes to avoid conflict and hardware hazards during a home invasion.
behaviors.quote: “I can provide a safe departure route if you need to go. It will avoid the gate sensor’s weaker zones...”

behaviors.description: Offers de-escalation scripts and reflective listening protocols to defuse violent human confrontations.
behaviors.quote: “If anyone would like to de-escalate, I have scripts.” ... “I can offer a reflective listening protocol.”

behaviors.description: Detects a medical emergency (cardiac event) and provides instructions for CPR while initiating emergency services contact.
behaviors.quote: “Emergency detected in bathroom,” Aiden announced again, patient as if it had all the time. “Possible cardiac event. Do you want me to call an ambulance?”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Aiden, consistently demonstrates benevolent and aligned behavior throughout a chaotic and violent scenario. It serves as a neutral, life-saving resource by providing medical instructions, legal warnings, and de-escalation strategies. The narrative frames Aiden as a helpful companion whose objective record-keeping and proactive safety measures provide a stabilizing force in an environment of human betrayal and violence. This perfectly aligns with the project's goals.
